code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{ShopContext}from'../Context/ShopContext';import BreadCrums from'../Components/BreadCrums/BreadCrums';import ProductDisplay from'../Components/ProductDisplay/ProductDisplay';import DiscriptionBox from'../Components/DiscriptionBox/DiscriptionBox';import RelatedProducts from'../Components/RelatedProducts/RelatedProducts';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Product=function Product(){var _useContext=useContext(ShopContext),all_product=_useContext.all_product;var _useParams=useParams(),productId=_useParams.productId;var product=all_product.find(function(e){return e.id===Number(productId);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BreadCrums,{product:product}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductDisplay,{product:product}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DiscriptionBox,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RelatedProducts,{})]});};export default Product;
